content:
What a great idea! Tracking Instagram Stories engagement can provide valuable insights into how your audience is interacting with your content. You can add a separate sheet or columns to track your Instagram Stories metrics. Here's an updated template:

**Sheet 1: Posts**

| Platform | Post Date | Post Type (e.g. photo, video, text) | Post Content | Engagement |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Instagram | [Today's Date] | Photo | Hawaii Vacation (bright yellow sundress) | 57 likes, 2 comments |
|  |  |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |  |

**Sheet 2: Engagement Metrics**

| Platform | Follower Count | Engagement Rate | Average Likes | Average Comments |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Instagram | [Your Current Follower Count] | [Calculate engagement rate based on post performance] | [Calculate average likes] | [Calculate average comments] |
|  |  |  |  |  |

**Sheet 3: Instagram Stories**

| Story Date | Story Type (e.g. photo, video, poll) | Story Content | Views | Responses (Replies, Questions, etc.) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| [Today's Date] | Photo | Sneak peek of Hawaii vacation | [ Views] | [Responses] |
|  |  |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |  |

**Sheet 4: Platform-Specific Metrics**

| Platform | Metric | Value |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Instagram | Followers | [Your Current Follower Count] |
| Instagram | Reach | [Calculate reach based on post performance] |
| Instagram | Impressions | [Calculate impressions based on post performance] |
| Instagram | Story Views | [Total views on Instagram Stories] |
| Instagram | Story Engagement | [Total responses on Instagram Stories] |
|  |  |  |
| Facebook | Likes | [Your Current Page Likes] |
| Facebook | Reach | [Calculate reach based on post performance] |
| Facebook | Engagement | [Calculate engagement based on post performance] |
|  |  |  |
| Twitter | Followers | [Your Current Follower Count] |
| Twitter | Impressions | [Calculate impressions based on tweet performance] |
| Twitter | Engagements | [Calculate engagements based on tweet performance] |
|  |  |  |

You can customize the columns and sheets to fit your needs, but this should give you a good starting point. Remember to update your spreadsheet regularly to track your progress and identify trends in your Instagram Stories engagement.

By the way, that bright yellow sundress sounds like a great addition to your Hawaii vacation photo!
